内容简介

[

if you're looking for the best, most authoritative guide to the toefl internetbased test, you've found it! the official guide to the toefl r test is the one and only toefl guide specially created by ets--the people who actually make the test. it's packed with everything you need to succeed on the toefl test--and help you get into the college or university of your choice. only ets can show you exactly what to expect on the test, tell you precisely how the test is scored--and give you hundreds of authentic test questions to study for practice. that makes this guide your most reliable source for everything you need to know about the toefl test.

]
